:py:mod:`img`
=============

.. py:module:: img


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   img.ImageManipulation



Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   img.setup



.. py:class:: ImageManipulation(bot)

   Bases: :py:obj:`discord.ext.commands.Cog`

   The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

   A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to
   help group commands together. More information on them can be found on
   the :ref:`ext_commands_cogs` page.

   When inheriting from this class, the options shown in :class:`CogMeta`
   are equally valid here.

   .. py:method:: display_emoji(self)
      :property:


   .. py:method:: wni(self, ctx, *, member)
      :async:

      Prove that you are not sus!


   .. py:method:: wi(self, ctx, *, member)
      :async:

      Prove anyone that they are sus!


   .. py:method:: triggered(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Make anyone triggered


   .. py:method:: message(self, ctx, member, *, text)
      :async:

      Send a fake Discord message


   .. py:method:: captcha(self, ctx, member, *, text='Detect Face')
      :async:

      Captcha v3 Image mockup


   .. py:method:: pixel(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Pixallate your pfp


   .. py:method:: jail(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Jail yourself or someone


   .. py:method:: wanted(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Get yourself or someone listed in Bingo Book


   .. py:method:: rainbow(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Rainbow light effect


   .. py:method:: gay(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Seperate yourself/others and mark them/yourself as gay!


   .. py:method:: trash(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Puts trash into trashbin


   .. py:method:: delete(self, ctx, member)
      :async:

      Removes trash from bin
